AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.label: Sun Breath
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.description: The legendary Breathing Style, Sun Breathing, is the first ever created. It channels the raw, primal energy of the sun to unleash devastating and precise techniques. All other Breathing Styles are derived from it.
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.resourceDescription: Current stored Breath, charged with the essence of the sun. This radiant energy powers devastating solar-based abilities, unleashing searing strikes that overwhelm and scorch enemies with the power of the sun.
